meanings.definition: To drink quickly and in large gulps.
meanings.sent1: She chugalug her water after the game.
meanings.sent2: He always chugalugs his soda when he's thirsty.
meanings.sent3: The little girl chugalugged her juice and giggled.
meanings.sent4: The car chugalugged gas as it raced down the highway.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall chugalugged water down the rocks.

meanings.definition: The act of drinking quickly and in large gulps.
meanings.sent1: The chugalug of the milk surprised him.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of chugalugs as everyone was thirsty.
meanings.sent3: The chugalug of the baby made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The chugalug of the river echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The chugalug of the waterfall was mesmerizing to watch.
